about_the_game:
Game Description:
Run a tavern in a dungeon and hire mercenaries to defeat the Demon Lord! But why are all these job candidates so... peculiar!?

Game Introduction:
This is a management simulation game. As the owner, you'll run a unique tavern with two main sources of income: daily operations and special missions.

During business hours, you'll be busy in the kitchen preparing delicious dishes through rhythm-game style cooking. You can also accept various commissions from emissaries of different nations. As your reputation grows, you'll unlock higher-tier missions with better rewards.

Use your earnings to hire mercenaries who'll venture into the dungeon to gather ingredients and equipment materials. The ingredients keep your tavern running, while the materials can be used to enhance your mercenaries' equipment.

New mercenaries come for job interviews every day. Chat with them to gauge their abilities and decide whether to hire them or not.

As you balance running your tavern and developing your mercenary team, you'll gradually clear level after level until you finally reach the Demon Lord. What awaits you there is...

name: 瘋狂地下餐酒館《Crazy Dungeon Tavern》

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTS 450
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 - i7 Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 750Ti
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Cook to the rhythm, interview and hire various mercenaries, with defeating the Demon Lord as the ultimate goal!
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
